description.content: Retrieves the event logs for given time period. All date & times are in UTC.

query.description: From the date and time (inclusive) to filter event log records by.
To the date and time (inclusive) to filter event log records by.
Limit the number of records returned.
Ordering of the event's time. SortBy can be introduced later on.

description.content: List all servers owned by account.

description.content: Create (request) new server for account. Server DNS will be configured to access Google's public DNS at 8.8.8.8 .

Any changes to the hostname or description using the BMC API will reflect solely in the BMC API and portal. The changes are intended to keep the BMC data up to date with your server. We do not have access to your server's settings. Local changes to the server's hostname will not be reflected in the API or portal.

item.name: Adds the server to a private network.

description.content: Adds the server to a private network.

request.name: Adds the server to a private network.

item.name: Removes the server from private network.

description.content: Removes the server from private network. No actual configuration is performed on the operating system. BMC configures exclusively the networking devices in the datacenter infrastructure. You are expected to perform network configuration changes in the operating system of this server. This is an advanced network action that can make your server completely unavailable over any network. Make sure you are able to access this server over remote console in case of misconfiguration.

request.name: Removes the server from private network.

description.content: Create an SSH Key. SSH Keys created can be used for server creation and reset functionality.
Sends a request to edit the limit of a quota.
Retrieves all rated usage for given time period. The information is presented as a list of rated usage records. Every record corresponds to a charge. All date & times are in UTC.

query.description: (Required) From year month (inclusive) to filter rated usage records by.
(Required) To year month (inclusive) to filter rated usage records by.

item.name: List the rated usage records for the current calendar month.

description.content: Retrieves all rated usage for the current calendar month. The information is presented as a list of rated usage records. Every record corresponds to a charge. All date & times are in UTC.

request.name: List the rated usage records for the current calendar month.

description.content: Retrieves all reservations associated with the authenticated account. All date & times are in UTC.

description.content: List all Private Networks owned by account.

    "description": "My Default Backend Network",

description.content: Request an IP Block. An IP Block is a set of contiguous IPs that can be assigned to other resources such as servers.
Delete an IP Block. An IP Block can only be deleted if not assigned to any resource.

Create a Rancher Server Deployment as described in Rancher Docs Architecture. Rancher Server allows the creation, import and management of multiple Downstream User Kubernetes Clusters. This is not a Downstream User Cluster.
